UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the Emotion Explorer application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

avatar.description: The user's selected avatar (e.g., an emoji).

Emotion.title: Emotion
Emotion.description: Represents an emotion that a user can track in their diary. Stored in a subcollection under each user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this emotion.

icon.description: An emoji or other icon representing the emotion.

color.description: A color associated with the emotion (e.g., for visual representation).

description.description: A user-defined description or meaning of the emotion.

isCustom.description: Flag to indicate if the emotion was created by the user.

DiaryEntry.title: DiaryEntry
DiaryEntry.description: Represents a diary entry, recording a user's emotion and experience on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the diary entry.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this entry.

emotionId.description: Reference to an Emotion document in the user's subcollection.

date.description: The date of the diary entry.

text.description: A textual description of the user's experience or feelings.

definition.description: Stores diary entries for each user. Path-based ownership enforced by the collection structure.
